## Description

Set cell metadata


## Usage

```r
set_cell_metadata(gobject, cell_metadata)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`gobject`     |     giotto object
`cell_metadata`     |     cell_metadata supplied as a nested list with spat_unit$feat_type$name
